name: Amerifat Simulator
description:
HOW MUCH CAN YOU EAT?

Become the average American and shovel handful after handful of greasy fast food down your gullet as fast as possible. Consume as many calories as you can to get the high score.

AVOID THE FRUITS AND VEGETABLES!

The average American is allergic to healthy foods and they will make them instantly defecate , so avoid the apples, pears and carrots!

CONTROLS

Point and click

Update 1/6/22

Version 1.1 is out. I overlooked how reflection probes would hinder performance on some machines, so I replaced the reflection probe for the mirror and now use camera projection instead. This should significantly increase framerate.
